name: reVeRb
description:
reVeRb is our Global Game Jam 2017 entry made at Facebook HQ. The theme was "waves".

reVeRb is a virtual reality survival horror game. You are trapped in a pitch black room and must use sound waves to navigate your surroundings and escape the monster hunting you.

Team

Programmer: Tyler Smith
Programmer: Ori Hanegby
Programmer: Mike Lagomarsino
Level Design: Jeremiah Watts
Level Design: Lucas Binkley
Modeler: Pete Swanson
Sound: Torrey Asman
Producer: Ian Elliott

NOTE: Requires a Vive
